text: 'ina khalaqna al'iinsan min nutfat mkhtltt min maa' alrajul wama' almrat, nkhtbrh baltkalyf alshareiat fima bed, fajaealnah min ajl dhlk dha sumie wadha bsr; lysme alayat, wayaraa aldlayl, 'iinaa bynna lah werrafnah tariq alhudaa waldalal walkhayr walshr; liakun 'iimaa mwmnana shakrana, wa'iimaa kfwrana jahdana
